title: Marginal Cost Analyzer
description: Interactive visualization that calculates and interprets marginal cost as the derivative of the cost function. Compares marginal cost to actual cost differences using graphs, tables, and bar charts across linear, quadratic, and cubic cost models.
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: Calculus
Derivatives
Marginal Cost
Economics
Business Applications
Rate of Change
prerequisites: Understanding of derivatives and power rule
Basic cost concepts (fixed vs variable costs)
learningObjective: Students will calculate and interpret marginal cost as the derivative of the cost function, comparing it to actual cost differences
